lead_paragraph: Remarks on Saturday by the president of the Federal Reserve Bank of New York appeared to respond to President-elect Donald J. Trump’s promise to roll back Wall Street regulations.

headline.print_headline: Fed Policy Maker Urges an End to ‘Too Big to Fail’
headline.main: Fed Policy Maker Urges Continued Work to End ‘Too Big to Fail’

snippet: Remarks on Saturday by the president of the Federal Reserve Bank of New York appeared to respond to President-elect Donald J. Trump’s promise to roll back Wall Street regulations....
